price: Wͻn a wͻpo nokorԑ no na wͻsi (amanfoͻ) kwan firi Nyankopͻn kwan no soͻ no, (Onyankopͻn) bεma wͻnwuma ayε kwa.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: He will cause to be lost
